name: Techblox
description:
🚦    Website

🏎️ Twitter

🚗 Facebook

🚙 Discord

If you’re a fan of building with Lego, you’ll enjoy creating vehicles, objects and entire worlds in Techblox. 

Construct your vehicles and machines from a wide assortment of block pieces!

Power it up with one of the engine blocks, and then take it for a drive!

You can also create your own worlds out of blocks, landscape tiles and a variety of props


Techblox is super early into its development cycle and we’re working towards a number of core features including:

  • Online multiplayer
  • Damage and destruction
  • Weaponry

If you’d like to join us in developing this game, please  download the launcher and consider joining our discord server. We have an incredible community who share their builds with us and continue to surprise us with their creativity.
